title: MI40044: Engineering Statistics - Quick Facts

Course name | Engineering Statistics

Credits | 3

Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Statistical methods in engineering, uni-variate and multivariate data analysis, log-linear, logit, logistic models, structural equation modelling, analysis of variance and design of experiments, use of statistical packages for engineering problem solving.
